metadata: (info { (description "Leoncito is a hunt game played by the Mapuche people of the Valle de Iglesias, Argentina.") (rules "One player plays as the dogs, the other as one lion. Pieces move orthogonally in any direction. The lion hops a dog to capture it. The dogs win by blocking the lion, the lion wins by eating all the dogs.") (source "Ferrarese 2003-2004: 148.") (id "1172") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/hunt/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in Argentina, around 1989.") } )
